name: @memo8/memo8
description: memo8 CLI - AI-powered developer productivity tool

scripts.build:dev: node scripts/set-env.js dev && tsc && chmod +x dist/bin/memo8.js
scripts.build:staging: node scripts/set-env.js staging && tsc && chmod +x dist/bin/memo8.js
scripts.build:prod: node scripts/set-env.js prod && tsc && chmod +x dist/bin/memo8.js
scripts.dist: MEMO8_ENV=dev node scripts/set-env.js ${MEMO8_ENV:-staging} && npm run build && node dist/bin/memo8.js --help && npm link
scripts.dist:staging: MEMO8_ENV=staging node scripts/set-env.js ${MEMO8_ENV:-staging} && npm run build && node dist/bin/memo8.js --help && npm link
scripts.dist:prod: MEMO8_ENV=prod node scripts/set-env.js ${MEMO8_ENV:-prod} && npm run build && node dist/bin/memo8.js --help && npm link
